channel.title: I need help plz (ASAP)
channel.description: [color=red]ok i need help i am trying to make a server even though im a really good at computers but not at making servers i would like tom make a server were me & my friends can play but have no idea who 2 do it i downloaded both moparscape client, & no-ip the no-ip address im wont to use is lostworld666.servegame.com if some one who know what there doing please help me i will give the info they need & dont care if you make ur self a admn i just wont to get a server up & going asap please e-mail me back a soon ass you can or e-mail my yahoo account at john_vctry@yahoo.com thanks alot i will be checking on it in alittle while ill be on all night tonight or tell me how you can im me on myspace also http://myspace.com/mudslide101[color[

item.title: I need help plz (ASAP)
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

I would hope you would know how to do it xD After 3 years. Linksys is the easiest to port forward tbh. Make sure you use the right port, 43594 and do it in the right section, cause there is also port blocking i think in linksys, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEI0VRAiyrk&feature=related Is a video on how to portforward. Make sure you are using the right ip’s and all that shit.

item.description:
@mudslide wrote:

lol i know how to do it now. just having a problem with port forward i thank my computer hates me. Because me and my friend set Portforward up right. but when we test the port on http://canyouseeme.org we are still running into problems. i have a linksys. We dont know what it could be

(I DO HAVE TEAMVIEWER)

item.title: I need help plz (ASAP)
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Ok for the problem of server you cant get or whatever? Download a server and client. Easiest i would say is a 317, You can find this is the “Server Downloads” section. Secondly getting a no-ip address, you need to go to no-ip.com, download the client and follow that shit. Google helps if you’re stuck on that. So does youtube. Change the server ip to i think your default gateway and your friends will connect via your actual IP or the no-ip you set up. So you wanna make yourself an admin? If you download a 317 server it will have a folder called “characters” once you have made your character sign out and shut the server off, Go into the “characters” folder and in a notepad file format should be the name of your character, open it up in notepad, Look for the line where it says “character-rights = (number)” change that number to: 1, for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner. compile it and run the server and you will be mod/admin/owner. Hope this helped mate, get back to me if you’re still stuck on anything or need further explaining.

LOL Fail. I just read the date of this. july 11th 2008 x.x

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Vilius2001, post:2, topic:219156”]WHAT UR TALKING ABOUT :eek: !!
U EVEN HELPED MY TO CREATE SERVER AND U DON’T KNOW HOW TO CREATE!!! :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:[/quote]
Lol he is saying basically
He and his friends want to run a server, but he doesn’t know how. He’s using the moparscape client, and no-ip changer. He wants you to do it for him, or help him, he does not care if you make yourself admin.

Yes i am noob-friendly
